content: this legal case involves two parties and is identified by the case number vsl sklep cp 1142022 the case is about a legal procedure regarding costs and the decision on costs is being appealed the final resolution of the case involves two immovable properties three loans and a joint investment in a specific asset the defendant is required to pay a total of 9570300 eur including the repayment of premarital debts the court appeal was successful and an amendment to the claim statement was allowed the court of appeal is currently reviewing the case which has been ongoing for two years the applicant has made several claims including repayment of loans and maintenance of joint property the court of first instance has agreed with the applicants arguments and believes they are entitled to the benefits they are seeking the court has allowed the applicant to amend their application to reach a final settlement the court of appeal has agreed to assess the case and has allowed an amended application the amendment is allowed to use existing evidence and resolve the dispute the court has made changes to the original order and the costs of the appeal will be decided later
